snippet: A former MTV executive who helped found the E! television network has announced a sizeable gift to the Hammer Museum in Los Angeles to begin a new $100,000 artist award with overtones of reality television, The Los Angeles Times reported.
abstract: A former MTV executive who helped found the E! television network has announced a sizeable gift to the Hammer Museum in Los Angeles to begin a new $100,000 artist award with overtones of reality television, The Los Angeles Times reported.

headline.main: Hammer Museum to Poll Public for a New $100,000 Art Prize
